article.aside: Moop, moop, moop. Moop? Moop? Moop? Moop? Moop? Moop. Moop. Moop. Moop... Moop... Moop. Moop.

section.p: After my first trip to Egypt back in 2010, when I was still a vegetarian, I discovered real tahini (or as they call it there, tahina, and ate it with everything. As salad dressing, as meze, as sandwich spread... I could not get enough of it. It was like peanut butter, only different - more exotic, more versatile, and better.
Macro-tip:To make it lighter, simply skip the banana.
